snippet: Twenty-eight Russian athletes who took part in the 2014 Winter Olympics in Sochi face disciplinary proceedings over possible manipulation of their urine samples, the International Olympic Committee (IOC) said on Friday....
lead_paragraph: Twenty-eight Russian athletes who took part in the 2014 Winter Olympics in Sochi face disciplinary proceedings over possible manipulation of their urine samples, the International Olympic Committee (IOC) said on Friday.

headline.main: IOC Investigates 28 Russian Athletes Over Sochi Samples
headline.print_headline: IOC Investigates 28 Russian Athletes Over Sochi Samples
